level-lock.description: In-memory advisory read/write locks for [levelup] keys.

level-updater.description: Update keys without overlapping changes - makes it possible to implement an atomic incrementer, JSON merger, etc.

levelplus.description: Adds atomic updates, increments, array pushes, set additions and user-defined atomic operations to [levelup].

level-atomics.description: Add (parallel) atomic operations like `insert`, `replace`, `increment` and `decrement` to [levelup].
